Fakir Apparels Ltd.3 days ago
Fakir Apparels leadership team sees off fiscal year 2023/24 in its annual business review meeting. The meeting highlighted a record breaking milestone in all areas of its business activities. FAL team’s initiatives on improving operational excellence from design to ship while leading the way in sustainability has proven to be a winning formula for the road ahead. Congratulations TEAM FAL!

May this special day bring peace, happiness and prosperity to you and your loved one. Eid Mubarak!

Fakir Apparels Ltd.3 months ago
Fakir Apparels from Bangladesh, along with H&M, represented Bangladesh in Brussels with a four-country delegation to the EU Trade Commission. They engaged with the EU Director General of Trade, discussing key trade policies and the impact on economic, social, and environmental aspects. This meeting marked the first time policymakers met with manufacturers from developing nations to understand the garment sector's perspective. Topics included LDC graduation, GSP+ importance for economic growth, and sustainability policies. Manufacturers welcomed EU sustainability policies but expressed caution on potential disruptions to supply chains. They emphasized the need for support in technology, innovation, and investments from economic blocks like the EU to accelerate policy adoption.

#bgmea #bangladesh #H&M #Fakirapparels #EUtrade #sustainability #fashion #brussels

A True Leader Making a Difference!
We are thrilled to congratulate Fakir Maniruzzaman, Managing Director of Fakir Apparels Ltd, on being recognized as a Commercially Important Person (CIP)! 🏆
His significant contributions to the country’s GDP and the positive impact on numerous livelihoods are truly commendable. Here’s to celebrating your success and the meaningful change you bring to so many lives! 🌟💼
